00019 /*! \file
00020  * \brief Dialing API
00021  */
00022 
00023 #ifndef _ASTERISK_DIAL_H
00024 #define _ASTERISK_DIAL_H
00025 
00026 #if defined(__cplusplus) || defined(c_plusplus)
00027 extern "C" {
00028 #endif
00029 
00030 /*! \brief Main dialing structure. Contains global options, channels being dialed, and more! */
00031 struct ast_dial;
00032 
00033 /*! \brief Dialing channel structure. Contains per-channel dialing options, asterisk channel, and more! */
00034 struct ast_dial_channel;
00035 
00036 typedef void (*ast_dial_state_callback)(struct ast_dial *);
00037 
00038 /*! \brief List of options that are applicable either globally or per dialed channel */
00039 enum ast_dial_option {
00040    AST_DIAL_OPTION_RINGING,     /*!< Always indicate ringing to caller */
00041    AST_DIAL_OPTION_ANSWER_EXEC, /*!< Execute application upon answer in async mode */
00042    AST_DIAL_OPTION_MUSIC,       /*!< Play music on hold instead of ringing to the calling channel */
00043    AST_DIAL_OPTION_MAX,         /*!< End terminator -- must always remain last */
00044 };
00045 
00046 /*! \brief List of return codes for dial run API calls */
00047 enum ast_dial_result {
00048    AST_DIAL_RESULT_INVALID,     /*!< Invalid options were passed to run function */
00049    AST_DIAL_RESULT_FAILED,      /*!< Attempts to dial failed before reaching critical state */
00050    AST_DIAL_RESULT_TRYING,      /*!< Currently trying to dial */
00051    AST_DIAL_RESULT_RINGING,     /*!< Dial is presently ringing */
00052    AST_DIAL_RESULT_PROGRESS,    /*!< Dial is presently progressing */
00053    AST_DIAL_RESULT_PROCEEDING,  /*!< Dial is presently proceeding */
00054    AST_DIAL_RESULT_ANSWERED,    /*!< A channel was answered */
00055    AST_DIAL_RESULT_TIMEOUT,     /*!< Timeout was tripped, nobody answered */
00056    AST_DIAL_RESULT_HANGUP,      /*!< Caller hung up */
00057    AST_DIAL_RESULT_UNANSWERED,  /*!< Nobody answered */
00058 };
00059 
00060 /*! \brief New dialing structure
00061  * \note Create a dialing structure
00062  * \return Returns a calloc'd ast_dial structure, NULL on failure
00063  */
00064 struct ast_dial *ast_dial_create(void);
00065 
00066 /*! \brief Append a channel
00067  * \note Appends a channel to a dialing structure
00068  * \return Returns channel reference number on success, -1 on failure
00069  */
00070 int ast_dial_append(struct ast_dial *dial, const char *tech, const char *device);
00071 
00072 /*! \brief Execute dialing synchronously or asynchronously
00073  * \note Dials channels in a dial structure.
00074  * \return Returns dial result code. (TRYING/INVALID/FAILED/ANSWERED/TIMEOUT/UNANSWERED).
00075  */
00076 enum ast_dial_result ast_dial_run(struct ast_dial *dial, struct ast_channel *chan, int async);
00077 
00078 /*! \brief Return channel that answered
00079  * \note Returns the Asterisk channel that answered
00080  * \param dial Dialing structure
00081  */
00082 struct ast_channel *ast_dial_answered(struct ast_dial *dial);
00083 
00084 /*! \brief Return state of dial
00085  * \note Returns the state of the dial attempt
00086  * \param dial Dialing structure
00087  */
00088 enum ast_dial_result ast_dial_state(struct ast_dial *dial);
00089 
00090 /*! \brief Cancel async thread
00091  * \note Cancel a running async thread
00092  * \param dial Dialing structure
00093  */
00094 enum ast_dial_result ast_dial_join(struct ast_dial *dial);
00095 
00096 /*! \brief Hangup channels
00097  * \note Hangup all active channels
00098  * \param dial Dialing structure
00099  */
00100 void ast_dial_hangup(struct ast_dial *dial);
00101 
00102 /*! \brief Destroys a dialing structure
00103  * \note Cancels dialing and destroys (free's) the given ast_dial structure
00104  * \param dial Dialing structure to free
00105  * \return Returns 0 on success, -1 on failure
00106  */
00107 int ast_dial_destroy(struct ast_dial *dial);
00108 
00109 /*! \brief Enables an option globally
00110  * \param dial Dial structure to enable option on
00111  * \param option Option to enable
00112  * \param data Data to pass to this option (not always needed)
00113  * \return Returns 0 on success, -1 on failure
00114  */
00115 int ast_dial_option_global_enable(struct ast_dial *dial, enum ast_dial_option option, void *data);
00116 
00117 /*! \brief Enables an option per channel
00118  * \param dial Dial structure
00119  * \param num Channel number to enable option on
00120  * \param option Option to enable
00121  * \param data Data to pass to this option (not always needed)
00122  * \return Returns 0 on success, -1 on failure
00123  */
00124 int ast_dial_option_enable(struct ast_dial *dial, int num, enum ast_dial_option option, void *data);
00125 
00126 /*! \brief Disables an option globally
00127  * \param dial Dial structure to disable option on
00128  * \param option Option to disable
00129  * \return Returns 0 on success, -1 on failure
00130  */
00131 int ast_dial_option_global_disable(struct ast_dial *dial, enum ast_dial_option option);
00132 
00133 /*! \brief Disables an option per channel
00134  * \param dial Dial structure
00135  * \param num Channel number to disable option on
00136  * \param option Option to disable
00137  * \return Returns 0 on success, -1 on failure
00138  */
00139 int ast_dial_option_disable(struct ast_dial *dial, int num, enum ast_dial_option option);
00140 
00141 /*! \brief Set a callback for state changes
00142  * \param dial The dial structure to watch for state changes
00143  * \param callback the callback
00144  * \return nothing
00145  */
00146 void ast_dial_set_state_callback(struct ast_dial *dial, ast_dial_state_callback callback);
00147 
00148 #if defined(__cplusplus) || defined(c_plusplus)
00149 }
00150 #endif
00151 
00152 #endif /* _ASTERISK_DIAL_H */
